snippet: Firefighters broke into a garage in Toledo on Monday afternoon and found five people, including three children, dead.
abstract: Police in Toledo, Ohio, say Sandy Ford, her son Andy Ford, and her three grandchildren are found dead in what appears to have been a murder-suicide; say Ford was upset about possibility of losing custody of her grandchildren.
lead_paragraph: Firefighters broke into a garage in Toledo on Monday afternoon and found five people, including three children, dead.

headline.main: Ohio: Carbon Monoxide Suspected in 5 Deaths
